Being a Whitebelt
July-17-2019

What it means to be a white belt is being a constant learner. A mind set of a black black is the same as a white belt in that you have to be a constant learner. Right now the mind set that I have is one of a constant learner. Its hard sometimes. Like I went back to do a small project that I've done in the tutorial plenty times and I still struggle with it. Hard work is and detication is the only way I know that set me on the path that I want to go on. So what i'm going to do keep grinding and the progress bar is going to keep moving forward because there no way its going to move backward if i have anything to say about it. Will today i'm going to pratice some javascript fundalmentals and the move on to some backend and then some frontend html/css and sass and look at some bs4. I still need to learn some python in the progress. 19 year old kid gets a 70000$ job and I starting to believe even more that a college is looking that tasteful.
